verses.roman:
sabe meli' gelā advaita ācāryera pāśe
prabhu dekhite ācārya calilā ullāse

synonyms: sabe—everyone; meli'-after assembling together; gelā—went; advaita—Advaita; ācāryera—of the leader of Navadvīpa; pāśe—in the presence; prabhu dekhite—to see Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; calilā—departed; ullāse—in great jubilation.
translation: All the Bengali devotees gathered around Advaita Ācārya, and in great jubilation Advaita Ācārya departed to Jagannātha Purī to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
